column5: Somebody may have already posted this, I'm not sure, but I know a while back people were looking for good fishing reports, like those from JustFishOntario in previous years. After many requests, MW has placed the Silver Water Wheel weekly fishing reports on the lodge website recently. Only a few weeks earlier in July are not reported upon.
